dt: {bc}a disk-shaped percussion instrument that produces a resounding tone when struck with a usually padded hammer
{bc}a saucer-shaped bell (as in a fire alarm) that is struck by a mechanical hammer
{bc}a wire rod wound in a flat spiral for sounding the time or chime or alarm (as in a clock)

shortdef: a disk-shaped percussion instrument that produces a resounding tone when struck with a usually padded hammer
a saucer-shaped bell (as in a fire alarm) that is struck by a mechanical hammer
a wire rod wound in a flat spiral for sounding the time or chime or alarm (as in a clock)
